author: mordant23
name: Clove-Black
description:
Clove-Black is a gothic theme for Cinnamon. It is a remix of dark-glass theme and Minty theme, with some tweaks made by me. The panel background is inspired DarkCold's panel.
 
Clove-Black is compatible with Cinnamon 2.0
 
Please report issues or suggestions here.
 
Installation
 
You can install from the repository .
 
sudo apt-get-respositry ppa:mordant23/themes
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install cinnamon-theme-clove-black 
 
Extract zip file and to the themes directory. That's usually /usr/share/themes/ for system wide installation or ~/.themes/ for a specific user.
 
Use Cinnamon Settings to choose the theme.
Restart Cinnamon by pressing "Alt+F2".
Type "r" and then press Enter.
